categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname
Category:Imperial Navy pilots of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: "'Double Edge'" was the call sign of an Imperial TIE/AG Aggressor starfighter pilot during the Galactic Civil War.
At one point during the Galactic Civil War, "Double Edge" was engaged in a dogfight with two Rebellion starfighters. He managed to destroy both an X-wing as well as another fighter at the same time.

"Double Edge" was a skilled pilot who stand out over other elite pilots, which allowed him to be trained to fly the expensive, multi-role TIE Aggressor starfighter. He was known to be relentless in pursuing his enemies in battle.
